extendedInfo.description: erodr is a social discovery App for college students only. erodr hosts a geo-fenced local forum around campus to provide an entertaining and private shared media stream. Posted content is not preserved on erodr servers after expiration. erodr short-range social media broadcasting is to students nearby you might like to know. Your posts collect private likes and comments, seen only by you. You connect with permission for 1:1 private messaging. Posting to the open forum: you can limit the viewable range and life of your posts, limit viewing to your connections, post to men or women only, and once a day you can post anonymously. The Map View shows you the on-campus location of your Connections when you both have "radar" turned ON.. Turn OFF for privacy. erodr uses community moderation to keep it fun. Likes extend the life of a post, and dislikes erode it. Its the best content from the student community today. See the most-liked posts from campuses around the country by turning "See Other Schools" ON.

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: The App has come a tremendous way in the last few weeks. It\'s the most fun/addicting form of social media in my opinion
reviews.author: Derrick McCarty

reviews.title: Good Mix
reviews.comment: Its like a cross between reddit and twitter.
reviews.author: Tommy Bertken

reviews.comment: Great app lots of fun on college campuses spread the word
reviews.author: Jeffrey Craig

reviews.title: Works somewhat
reviews.comment: Is extremely slow crashes on my s4 and nexus 7. Not optimized for tablets. Takes too long to load notifications, leaves much to be desired
reviews.author: Michael Nazzario

reviews.title: Great app but glitchey
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app but its still glitchey  There have been a lot of updates and it is getting better though
reviews.author: Ian Bacich

reviews.title: No messages
reviews.comment: Mad models are trying to message me, but the app fails when I try to check them. Ughhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
reviews.author: Darren Shaw

reviews.title: Android needs attention
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app. I would give it 5 STARS but it\'s super glitchy! I have an S3 and can\'t even look at my notifications
reviews.author: Desmon Turner

reviews.title: Glitched
reviews.comment: The app tries to load all the posts at once and it makes the app run slowly. Give it a week and I\'m sure the devs will get it together.
reviews.author: Bobby Zuiss
